A warm welcome to our new mini-workshop series “Basic Biostatistics & Bioinformatics”, where SLUBI and SLU’s Center for Statistics collaborate to bring you a mix of theoretical background and practical coding on a variety of topics.
 
This session we start the series with an Introduction to R. 

**If you want to code along please bring your own laptop with R and R-studio installed.**
 
**When:** Monday Nov 13th, 09:30\
**Where:** Campus Alnarp, Horticum, sal Triticum\
or via **[Zoom](https://slu-se.zoom.us/j/69486568642)** (Password: 410 410)

All materials are available on [Github](https://github.com/SLUBioinformaticsInfrastructure/Three_Bees_Workshop_Series).
